onboarding.heading: Respond to Requests
onboarding.text: Browse through and fulfill requests made by other users who need help with food.

onboarding.heading: Accept Offers
onboarding.text: Explore and pick-up offers made by other users who want to share food and provide assistance.

onboarding.heading: Make Requests & Offers
onboarding.text: Create your own requests or offers of food assistance.

error.incorrect: The email address or password you have entered is incorrect.
error.noUser: There is no account registered with this email address.

signup.loading.label: Loading
signup.user.label: Username
signup.display.label: Display name
signup.email.label: Email address
signup.pass.label: Password
signup.pass.desc: {{ ['Must be at least 6 characters long', 'Must contain an uppercase letter and a lower case letter (A, z)', 'Must contain a number' ] }}
signup.passConfirm.label: Confirm Password
signup.submit.label: Sign up

error.required: Please fill out all of the required fields.
error.userTaken: This username is already taken. Please try again.
error.emailTaken: An account already exists with this email address.
error.email: Please enter a valid email address.
error.passShort: The password you entered is too short
error.passCase: Your password must contain an uppercase letter and a lower case letter.
error.passNum: Your password must contain a number
error.passMatch: The passwords you have entered do not match.
error.terms: You must accept the terms and conditions to create an account.

request.heading: Forgot your password
request.text: Please enter the email address you'd like your password reset information to be sent to.
request.email.label: Email address
request.submit.label: Request reset link

requestConfirm.heading: Request sent
requestConfirm.text: If there is an account associated with the email address you entered, you will receive a password reset link soon.

reset.heading: Reset your password
reset.text: Enter a new password to reset the password on your account. We’ll ask for this password whenever you log in.
reset.pass.label: New password
reset.pass.desc: {{ ['Must be at least 6 characters long', 'Must contain an uppercase letter and a lower case letter (A, z)', 'Must contain a number' ] }}
reset.passConfirm.label: Confirm new password
reset.submit.label: Reset password

resetConfirm.heading: Your password has been reset
resetConfirm.text: We'll ask for your new password whenever you log in.
resetConfirm.button.label: Take me to Zero Hunger

error.required: Please fill out all of the required fields.
error.passShort: The password you entered is too short
error.passCase: Your password must contain an uppercase letter and a lower case letter.
error.passNum: Your password must contain a number
error.passMatch: The passwords you have entered do not match.

location.heading: See food offers and requests in your area
location.text: We’ll show you requests and offers based on your postal code
location.postalCode.label: Your postal code
location.postalCode.desc: Other people will only see an estimate of how far away your postal code is from theirs (i.e., 5 km away)
location.error.invalid: The postal code you entered is not valid.
location.submit.label: Save my postal code
location.alt.label: Not right now

notifications.heading: Never miss a thing
notifications.text: Get push notifications to keep you up to date on new messages about your requests and offers!
notifications.submit.label: Yes, please
notifications.alt.label: Maybe later

fallback.heading: No requests matching your filters
fallback.text: Try removing some of your filters to get more results.
fallback.button.label: Clear filters

fields.label: Title
fields.desc: Create a descriptive title for your request.

fields.label: Photo(s)
fields.desc: Add photo(s) to help community members understand what you are looking for.

fields.label: Food category
fields.desc: Please select all the food categories that apply.

fields.label: Dietary preferences
fields.desc: Please indicate any dietary preferences or allergies that need to be respected in your request.

fields.label: Quantity
fields.desc: Please input the desired quantity of the food item you need.

fields.label: Need by date
fields.desc: Please select a date you would need this food by. Your request will expire on this date.

fields.label: Pick up or delivery location
fields.desc: Please indicate the postal code of your desired pick up or delivery location. No one else will see your postal code.

fields.label: Pick up or delivery preferences
fields.desc: Select all that apply

fields.label: Access needs for pick up or delivery
fields.desc: Please indicate if you have any access needs for receiving your requested food.

fields.label: Description
fields.desc: Describe your food request in detail

message.heading: Send a message
message.placeholder: Hi {{ poster.displayName }}, do you still need this? I have some to share.
message.submit.label: Send

fields.label: Title
fields.desc: Create a descriptive title for your offer.

fields.label: Photo(s)
fields.desc: Add photo(s) to help community members understand what you are offering.

fields.label: Food category
fields.desc: Please select all the food categories that apply.

fields.label: Dietary preferences
fields.desc: Please indicate any dietary preferences or allergies that apply to the food you are offering.

fields.label: Quantity
fields.desc: Please input the desired quantity of the food item you're offering.

fields.label: Expiry date
fields.desc: Please select a date you would need to give away this food by. Your offer will expire on this date.

fields.label: Pick up or delivery location
fields.desc: Please indicate the postal code of your desired pick up or delivery location. No one else will see your postal code.

fields.label: Pick up or delivery preferences
fields.desc: Select all that apply

fields.label: Access needs for pick up or delivery
fields.desc: Please indicate if you have any access needs for sharing the food you are offering.

fields.label: Description
fields.desc: Describe your food request in detail

message.heading: Send a message
message.placeholder: Hi {{ poster.displayName }}, is this still available?
message.submit.label: Send

requests.heading: No requests yet
requests.text: You will see your history once you make your first food request.
requests.button.label: Request Food

offers.heading: No offers yet
offers.text: You will see your history once you make your first food offer.
offers.button.label: Offer Food

fallback.heading: No messages yet
fallback.text: Start a conversation by replying to a food request or offer.
fallback.button.label: {{ app.strings.backToHome }}

fallback.heading: No notifications
fallback.text: You will be notified when one of your posts is expiring soon
fallback.button.label: {{ app.strings.backToHome }}

request.text: Your request for {{ requestTitle }} will expire in {{ expiryCalculated }} days
request.buttonExtend.label: Extend by 1 week

offer.text: Your offer for {{ requestTitle }} will expire in {{ expiryCalculated }} days
offer.buttonExtend.label: Extend by 1 week

postNew.heading: What would you like to post?

options.label: Extend expiry date by one week

blockUser.heading: Block user
blockUser.text:
This user has been blocked.

They will no longer be able to message you nor see your posts.

Would you like to {{ link.label }}?
blockUser.link.label: submit a report

confirmation.text:
Thanks for your report.

By submitting a report, you are helping to make the app a safer and more positive environment for everyone.

We will investigate any issues that are brought to our attention. Thank you for your help in this effort.

If you have any further concerns, you can contact us at {{ link }}.
